1.20.2.1.20.2-2.0.4: Fixes an issue with block entity rendering with Iris shaders.

1.20.1.1.20.1-2.0.4: Fixes an issue with block entity rendering with Iris shaders.
1.20.1.1.20.1-2.0.3: Fixes an issue causing armor overlays to render underneath the base layer. Fixes an issue causing an armor afterimage to appear with Complementary Shaders.
1.20.1.1.20.1-2.0.2: Fixes stuttering when chunks with liquids are loaded.
1.20.1.1.20.1-2.0.1: Fixes z-fighting with emissive overlays when Sodium or one of its ports is present.
1.20.1.1.20.1-2.0.0: Adds the `transparency` option for emissive textures, which supports `translucent` (partial transparency) or `auto` (based on the block's render type). By default, textures are now set to `auto` to improve compatibility with Sodium and its Forge ports. Fixes a stuttering issue on 1.19.4 and 1.20.1. Fixes enchantment overlays on Forge.
1.20.1.1.20.1-1.1.1: Adds a resource pack that can be enabled to fix redstone overlay z-fighting.
1.20.1.1.20.1-1.1.0: Adds support for emissive and non-emissive overlays for liquids.
1.20.1.1.20.1-1.0.1: Fix invisible shulker boxes, beds, banners, conduit, chests, mob heads, and shield in the inventory.

By default, textures are now set to `auto` to improve compatibility with Sodium and its Forge ports. Fixes a stuttering issue on 1.19.4 and 1.20.1. Fixes enchantment overlays on Forge.
